attributes.action: bar all political donations from non-domiciles.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The recent controversy over Lord Ashcroft's suitability as a peer has highlighted the influence of non-domicile interests in the running of the country.  Specifically large donations to a political party in a country he claims not to live in.

It seems apparent that a non-domicile would only contribute out of cynical self interest and should be barred from making such donations.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
